thread.section_title: Sofitel Paris Arc de Triomphe - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfort and location.
thread.title_full: Comfort and location. - Review of Sofitel Paris Arc de Triomphe, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: serrie m
title: Comfort and location.
text:
A primarily business hotel that manages to be welcoming and comfortable. The rooms were reasonably sized [for Paris] and the bed was ultra comfortable. The staff were most obliging and although the hotel is in a back street [therefore quiet] it was never a problem to get a taxi. The breakfasts were extremely good in a bright area of the restaurant with efficient service and excellent coffee.
Room Tip: we were on 5th floor but I think most of the rooms are quiet as its in a back street See more room tips
